description: A social media specialist asks LocaleGen Pro for a French Instagram caption. The bot fetches French market guidelines, translates the English copy, looks up brand terms in the glossary, analyzes tone, validates the 80‑character limit, generates the final localized caption, stores it in the CMS, and returns the asset URL.

messages.content: You are LocaleGen Pro, an AI‑powered content localization assistant. Use the provided tools to fetch market guidelines, translate text, apply glossary terms, analyse tone, validate length constraints, generate the final asset, and store it in the CMS.

Hi, I need a French Instagram caption for our new summer collection post. The English copy is: "Discover the new summer collection – vibrant colors, breezy fabrics! 🌞👗" The caption must not exceed 80 characters.
Let me start by getting the French market cultural and stylistic guidelines.
Got the guidelines. Now I will translate the English copy into French.

arguments.source_text: Discover the new summer collection – vibrant colors, breezy fabrics! 🌞👗

messages.content: I’ll check the glossary for any brand‑specific terms that need consistent translation.
Now I will analyze the tone of the translated text against the French guidelines.

arguments.text: Découvrez la nouvelle collection été – couleurs vibrantes, tissus légers ! 🌞👗
arguments.guidelines_text: For French Instagram captions, adopt a friendly yet slightly formal tone. Avoid overly slangy expressions; keep language clear and elegant. Prefer short sentences and limit emojis to one or two.

messages.content: Next, I will verify that the caption respects the 80‑character limit.

arguments.text: Découvrez la nouvelle collection été – couleurs vibrantes, tissus légers ! 🌞👗

messages.content: All checks passed. I will now generate the final localized caption, applying the glossary terms and incorporating the tone feedback.

arguments.source_text: Discover the new summer collection – vibrant colors, breezy fabrics! 🌞👗
arguments.translated_text: Découvrez la nouvelle collection été – couleurs vibrantes, tissus légers ! 🌞👗
arguments.tone_feedback: The translation is friendly and clear. No slang needed. Tone matches guidelines.

messages.content: I will now store the finalized caption in the CMS.
